name: Differing Sight
description:
FINDING THE RIGHT WAY IS NOT EASY WHEN YOU ARE OUT OF TIME

Diagnosed with a terminal disease, Hajo decides to travel to Japan to make the most out of what little time he has left. As he travels through multiple locations he has to deal with the fact that his perception of the world around him keeps changing. The world doesn't seem so easy to understand anymore.

Features

  • Solve mind-bending puzzles
  • Explore breathtaking landscapes
  • Make Hajo's dream come true

Team Credits

  • António Rua (Game Designer)
  • Constança Rocha (Game Artist)
  • Miguel Monteiro (Game Developer)
  • Francisco Esteves (Music)

DISCLAIMER: Keep in mind that this is just a demo of our idea, not a complete game. We hope you will still enjoy it!
